title: Tom and Jerry ballon shooter v2.5 [PD]
description:
The popular cartoons: Tom & Jerry reached into Android software. Tom & Jerry ballon shooter it's a game recommended for players of all ages. The application shows 680 levels which means good hours of fun.

Supported Android versions: 2.3.3 - 4.1.2 +

How to play:

- must crush at least 3 or more ballonss of the same colour in order to dissapear.when all the ballonss are finished will pass to the next level
- Click the menu key to select levels and for other options.

Game Features:

1. Puzzle Mode - hundreds levels of fun and challenging puzzles
2. Arcade Mode - ballonss falling gradually so you need a quicker response to shoot.

More info:
